greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: n-th prime + sum of digits of n-th prime.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Table[ Prime[n] + Apply[ Plus, IntegerDigits[ Prime[n]]], {n, 1, 75} ]
program: (PARI) SumD(x)={local(s); s=0; while (x>9, s+=x-10*(x\10); x\=10); return(s + x)}
{ for (n=1, 1000, a=prime(n); a+=SumD(a); write("b065073.txt", n, " ", a)) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Oct 05 2009
results.author: _Bodo Zinser_, Nov 09 2001
ext: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org) and _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 13 2001
